title: Oprah Winfrey, Stacey Abrams, Tommy's New Week, North West and more.
itunes:title: Oprah Winfrey, Stacey Abrams, Tommy's New Week, North West and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  BC has been given a new face and name. Disabled cameras in the house took the cake today with The Cheef.   R. Kelly gets 30 years.  Steve is defending Tommy's vertical issue.  Stacey Abrams raises $22 million on her way to November 8th.  The Las Vegas Raiders make history.  Thomas Miles has a new week.  Someone in Kim K's camp does not like the stalkarazzi.  This round of Would You Rather was touchy to say the least.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talked about trusting God's will and timing.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
